Metadata.title: HRZ Logistics - Warehousing & Distribution
Metadata.description: HRZ Logistics provides end-to-end warehousing and distribution solutions across 50+ countries. Storage, logistics, cargo, trucking, and packaging services.

Hero.title: Warehousing
Hero.description: HRZ takes care of your end-to-end warehousing and distribution logistics, from our strategic network of storage facilities; capable to fulfill your customer's demands.

FeaturedServices.warehousingDesc: More than just storage, our warehouses are your supply chain pit-stop, expertly designed to keep your products flowing at the pace of your choosing. Present in over 50 countries.
FeaturedServices.distributionDesc: Take advantage of our extensive distribution network for product deliveries to your end customer; whether DC, wholesaler, retail store or end-consumer.
FeaturedServices.valueAddedDesc: Save time and costs by customising on the go. From scanning and labelling to product customisation and late localisation with ultimate flexibility.

ServicesGrid.title: Our Services
ServicesGrid.description: Comprehensive warehousing and logistics solutions tailored to your business needs across the globe.
ServicesGrid.storageDesc: Flexible storage options with excellent warehousing facilities, completely equipped to handle bulk cargo and break bulk requirements.
ServicesGrid.logisticsDesc: Let us simplify and connect your supply chain from end to end with our comprehensive logistics solutions.
ServicesGrid.cargoDesc: Our Cargo Setups, adjacent to all terminals, are open 24/7 providing safe and speedy dispatch and delivery.
ServicesGrid.truckingDesc: Our loyal fleet of over 600,000 independent truckers is always ready to roll for your delivery needs.
ServicesGrid.packagingDesc: We help with all types of packing operations, no matter the location or destination of your products.
ServicesGrid.warehousingDesc: Customised warehouse logistics solutions with great importance on flexibility, transparency and best practice.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us as Your Logistics Partner
WhyChooseUs.description: We approach warehouse design as a science which needs an in-depth knowledge of the entire supply chain to implement successfully.
WhyChooseUs.globalCoverageDesc: Present in over 50 countries with warehouses strategically located near major ports and transportation hubs.
WhyChooseUs.secureCompliantDesc: State-of-the-art security systems and full regulatory compliance to protect your valuable inventory at every step.
WhyChooseUs.operations247Desc: Round-the-clock operations ensure your goods are always moving, with real-time tracking and dedicated support.
WhyChooseUs.flexibleSolutionsDesc: From full truck loads to parcel delivery, we tailor our solutions to match your specific business requirements.

Features.title: End-to-End Logistics Solutions
Features.wmsSubtitle: We can control our warehouse's entire inbound inventory process in Mexico through this warehouse management system.
Features.engineeringSubtitle: Optimise the management of your production sites and warehouses with customised and secure solutions, adapted to the specifics of your industry.
Features.engineeringItem1: Engineering and design of optimised solutions
Features.engineeringItem3: Implementation of quality standards and performance indicators
Features.engineeringItem4: Stock management, warehousing and value-added services
Features.distributionSubtitle: Ensure product availability at your points of sale and customers with dedicated or shared logistics solutions to optimise your costs.
Features.supportSubtitle: Benefit from operational support to implement the most adapted solution.
Features.supportDescription: Our engineering and project management department designs with you the most adapted solution for your inbound and outbound challenges, relying on logistics, transport and IT engineers.

CTA.title: Local Expertise, Global Coverage
CTA.description: Present in over 50 countries and backed by our extensive network, our teams of local experts are ready to advise you on the best solution for your business.

Footer.description: We approach warehouse design as a science which needs an in-depth knowledge of the entire supply chain to implement successfully.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.description: We store a vast array of inventory for our clients and our warehouse storage and distribution services are unique to each client.
ServicesPage.storageDesc: We offer our customers flexible storage options with excellent warehousing facilities. Our facilities are completely equipped to handle bulk cargo including various other requirements such as break bulk.
ServicesPage.logisticsDesc: Let us simplify and connect your supply chain from end to end with our comprehensive logistics management solutions.
ServicesPage.cargoDesc: Our Cargo Setups, adjacent to all terminals, are open 24/7 providing safe and speedy dispatch and delivery of cargo consignments to our clients.
ServicesPage.truckingDesc: Our loyal fleet of over 600,000 independent truckers is always ready to roll for your delivery and distribution needs.
ServicesPage.packagingDesc: With our packing services, we can help you with all types of packing operations, no matter the location or where the products are going to be sent.
ServicesPage.warehousingDesc: HRZ designs customised warehouse logistics solutions for your business model and your operations. We attach great importance to flexibility and transparency.
ServicesPage.ctaText: Need a custom solution? Let us know about your requirements.
